bgDescription: A medication for reviving downed individuals in emergencies. Its portable design includes a mechanical compartment with highly concentrated active ingredients for quick recovery.
description: Used to immediately revive and heal 10% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. (This effect only applies to your own Resonators in Co-op Mode)
obtainDescription: Used to immediately revive and heal 10% of a selected downed Resonator's Max HP. This item can only be used once every 60s. (This effect only applies to your own Resonators in Co-op Mode)
